DOC.brief_summary: The investigators describe a novel technique for GB fundus retraction.
DOC.brief_title: A Novel Technique For Gall Bladder Fundus Retraction In Single Incision Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy
DOC.detailed_description: few methods are available for gall bladder (GB) retraction in SILC to replace the usage of ancillary ports imitating retraction from conventional technique, e.g. trans-parietal stitches mini-loop retractor , a Kirschner wire . This technical note describes a novel way to retract the gall bladder fundus.
DOC.criteria: all cases underwent single incision cholecystectomy
